Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowFarCursor.png"
wait(3) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\ArrowCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

bombScript = script.Parent.Bomb Tool = script.Parent
function plant(pos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
local bomb = Tool.Handle:Clone() bomb.CanCollide = true bomb.Transparency = 0 bomb.Position = pos bomb.Size = Vector3.new(2,2,2) bomb.Name = "FuseBomb" bomb.Locked = true
local spark = Instance.new("Sparkles") spark.Name = "Fuse" spark.Parent = bomb
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = bomb
bomb.Parent = game.Workspace local new_script = bombScript:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = bomb
end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1 plant(Tool.Handle.Position) wait(3) Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0
Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

FuseSound = Instance.new("Sound") FuseSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11565378" FuseSound.Parent = script.Parent FuseSound:Play()
blowsound = Instance.new("Sound") blowsound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID=86300411" blowsound.Parent = script.Parent blowsound.Volume = 1
cricketsound = Instance.new("Sound") cricketsound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID=86300687" cricketsound.Parent = script.Parent cricketsound.Volume = 1
laugh1sound = Instance.new("Sound") laugh1sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID=86300561" laugh1sound.Parent = script.Parent laugh1sound.Volume = 1
laugh2sound = Instance.new("Sound") laugh2sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID=86300471" laugh2sound.Parent = script.Parent laugh2sound.Volume = 1
laugh3sound = Instance.new("Sound") laugh3sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID=86300362" laugh3sound.Parent = script.Parent laugh3sound.Volume = 1
local total_time = 5 -- seconds local cur_time = 0
function update(frac) script.Parent.Fuse.Color = Color3.new(1,1 - frac,0) end
local players_ret= {} function getNearPlayers(mindist,pos) local parent_pos= pos
local i=1 for _, player in pairs(game.Players:GetPlayers()) do print (player) tdist= (player.Character.Torso.CFrame.p-parent_pos).magnitude
if tdist<mindist then players_ret[i]=player i=i+1 print (tdist) end end --table.setn(players,i+1) return players_ret end
function blowUp() blowsound:play() wait(.45) explosion = Instance.new("Explosion") explosion.BlastRadius = 12 explosion.BlastPressure = 0 -- these are really wussy units
-- find instigator tag local creator = script.Parent:findFirstChild("creator") if creator ~= nil then explosion.Hit:connect(function(part, distance) onPlayerBlownUp(part, distance, creator) end) end
explosion.Position = script.Parent.Position explosion.Parent = game.Workspace script.Parent.Transparency = 1 local radius = 8 for x = -radius, radius, 4 do for y = -radius, radius, 4 do for z = -radius, radius, 4 do local vec = Vector3.new(x,y,z) if vec.magnitude <= radius then local cellPos = game.Workspace.Terrain:WorldToCell(explosion.Position + vec) local targetmaterial = game.Workspace.Terrain:GetCell(cellPos.x, cellPos.y, cellPos.z) game.Workspace.Terrain:SetCell(cellPos.x,cellPos.y,cellPos.z,Enum.CellMaterial.Empty,0,0) end end end end
local checkRad = 12 for x = -checkRad, checkRad, 4 do for y = -checkRad, checkRad, 4 do for z = -checkRad, checkRad, 4 do local vec = Vector3.new(x,y,z) if vec.magnitude <= checkRad then local cellPos = game.Workspace.Terrain:WorldToCell(explosion.Position + vec) local targetmaterial = game.Workspace.Terrain:GetCell(cellPos.x, cellPos.y, cellPos.z) game.Workspace.Terrain:AutowedgeCell(cellPos.x,cellPos.y,cellPos.z) end end end end local players = getNearPlayers(20,script.Parent.Position) print(players) wait(1.4) print(table.getn(players)) local num_play = table.getn(players) if num_play<1 then cricketsound:play() print("cricket sound played") elseif num_play==1 then laugh1sound:play() forceLaugh(players,5) elseif num_play==2 then laugh2sound:play() forceLaugh(players,7) else laugh3sound:play() forceLaugh(players,10) end end
function forceLaugh(players,ltime) local startTime= time() local char
for _, player in pairs (players) do char=player.Character if char then local lscript = script:FindFirstChild("LaughScript"):Clone() lscript.Parent=char lscript:FindFirstChild("laughTime").Value=ltime lscript.Disabled = false end end print("stopped laughing") end
function onPlayerBlownUp(part, distance, creator) if part.Name == "Head" then local humanoid = part.Parent.Humanoid tagHumanoid(humanoid, creator) end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, creator) -- tag does not need to expire iff all explosions lethal
if creator ~= nil then local new_tag = creator:clone() new_tag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end --countdown while cur_time < total_time do update(cur_time / total_time) local e,g = wait(.5) cur_time = cur_time + e end
blowUp() wait(5) script.Parent:remove()

local laughAni= Instance.new("Animation") laughAni.AnimationId = "http://www.roblox.com/Asset?ID=86258575"
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer local character = player.Character
local startTime= time() local hum=script.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local animTrack=hum:LoadAnimation(laughAni) local ltime=script:FindFirstChild("laughTime") while not ltime do ltime=script:FindFirstChild("laughTime") wait() end animTrack:Play()
while(time()-startTime<ltime.Value) do if hum then hum.Jump=false hum.Sit=true end wait(.3)
if hum then hum.Sit=false hum.Jump=true end wait(.2) hum:TakeDamage(5) end
if hum then hum.Sit=false hum.Jump=false end
animTrack:Stop()
print("stopped laughing")
script:Destroy()
